helpText:
📘 *Help & FAQ*

*To Book:*
1️⃣ Tap *Book Appointment*
2️⃣ Choose a service
3️⃣ Select a date, time & confirm

*To Change/Cancel:*
1️⃣ Tap *Manage Appointments*
2️⃣ Choose *Reschedule* or *Cancel*

📞 *Need Help?*
✉️ help@example.com
📱 +91 1234567890
🕘 Mon–Sat: 9 AM – 6 PM
